performing_artist_name.description: Last name of a person or full name of a group that has performed the work in public. Note that if the performer is known by a single name, it should be entered in this field.

performing_artist_first_name.description: First name associated with the performing artist identified in the previous field.

performing_artist_ipi_name_number.description: The IPI Name Number corresponding to this performing artist. Values reside in the IPI database.

isni.description: The ISNI assigned to the performing artist. Values reside in the INSI-IA Database

performance_language.description: The language used in the performance. Values and reference for this field reside in the Language Code Table.
